sql.trim: XH, YWLX, YWZLX, YWGLXH, RWBH, RWLY, RWMC, RWNR, SJKSSJ, SJJSSJ, RWCSYY, YQBJSJ, SFCQ, FZJG, BLR, BZ, CJSJ, CJR, XGSJ, XGR, ORGID, BJQK

mapper.select: SELECT A.BLR as CBBLR,A.FKSJ,A.FKNR,A.FKR,A.TYPE,A.XH,A.RWBH,A.SJKSSJ,A.YQBJSJ,A.RWNR,A.YWLX,A.YWZLX,A.YJGZ,A.YJGLNR,A.SFBJ,A.BJQK,A.ZDBH,B.ZZQC AS ZZJC,C.YHMC FROM ( SELECT * FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE XH = #{XH} )A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ZZBH,ZZQC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG )B ON A.FZJG = B.ZZBH LEFT JOIN ( SELECT YHID, YHMC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_YH ) C ON A .BLR = C.YHID

SELECT WJID AS FJXH,WJMC AS FJMC,MLSY AS FJPATH, CASE WHEN WJDX/1024>=1 THEN Round(WJDX/1024, 2) || 'MB' WHEN WJDX<1 THEN '小于1KB' ELSE Round(WJDX,2) || ' KB' END AS FJDX, WJLX AS FJHZ,SCR AS SCR FROM T_PLATFORM_WJ_WJXX WHERE YWSJID= #{XH}
SELECT ZZBH, ZZJC FROM U_WRYDTGL_XC.T_ADMIN_RMS_ZZJG WHERE SFYX = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE T_GZRW_JBXX SET FKR = #{FKR}, FKSJ = #{FKSJ}, FKNR = #{FKNR}, SFBJ = #{SFBJ},MARKTYPE=#{MARKTYPE}, BJQK = '1' WHERE XH = #{XH}
mapper.select: SELECT LZZT FROM T_GZRW_JBXX WHERE XH = #{XH}
SELECT a.XH,a.RWBH,a.FKNR,a.FKSJ,b.YHMC as BLR FROM T_GZRW_LZXX a LEFT JOIN T_ADMIN_RMS_YH b ON a.BLR = b.XTZH WHERE a.RWBH=#{RWBH} ORDER BY a.FKSJ ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_GZRW_LZXX WHERE RWBH=#{RWBH} AND BLR =#{BLR}
